events – Celebration

40th Anniversary Celebration

Vietnamese Alliance Church in San Francisco celebrated their 40th Anniversary of its founding in 1975. Over decades past, it has been a sanctuary for many; from the service in the sanctuary where hymns of praises were sung and sermons preached, to Sunday School where empowering and liberating truths were discovered and marvelled at, and fellowship over lunch was enjoyed by all. Read More ›

Coyote Point Park Picnic

Our church had a great picnic at Coyote Point Park last September, 2015. Enjoy this small collection of photos. Read More ›

events – Recreation

Natural Bridges State Beach

Families with young children had a great picnic at the Natural Bridges State Beach of Santa Cruz last August, 2015. The pictures say it all about the beauty of this place. Enjoy this small collection of photos. Read More ›

events – Camping

VAY Bay Area Camp

In this Summer of 2015, the Vietnamese Youth Alliance organized a camp for the youth of San Francisco Bay Area at the Daybreak Camp in Felton, CA. Pastor David Huynh was the main speaker. Enjoy a small collection of photos and summaries of the sermons. Read More ›

events – Celebration

Tết Nguyên Đán 2015

Celebration of Tết Nguyên Đán (Lunar New Year) of 2015 at Hội Thánh Tin Lành Việt Nam in the city of San Francisco (VACSF). Enjoy this collection of photos. Read More ›
